main event: A witness reported seeing a bright object flying high and fast, which dived and then climbed back up in Leadville, Colorado on June 4, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a pale, extremely bright, almost luminous glow., The observation lasted approximately 3 seconds., The witness had tried to grab a camera but was unable to capture a photo., There were no other witnesses to the event., The sighting might have been caused by reflection from a window pane.
witness description: individual who reported seeing the object
